Text: I'm not surprised to see these on here. I don't see any reason to spend $250+ for these guides.

These guides are modified to add advertisements for other websites into the Options page.

Whilst that in itself isn't really a bad thing, I get paranoid as to what else may have been changed.
These marked areas don't exist in the official guide: http://i.imgur.com/QXnKLVY.png
